statements: DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
DELETE FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND engagement_level > 100;
DELETE FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND (likes < 50 OR shares < 20);
DELETE FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE brand_id = 5 AND post_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM BrandSentiment WHERE brand_id = 123 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_id = 456 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM likes WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_id = 3;
